paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information related to the TTR gene, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: A recent study estimated that 3% of the African American population has the V122I mutation, which can cause TTR cardiac amyloidosis.

functional_data.summary: The V122I variant is associated with decreased stability of the TTR tetramer, leading to increased amyloidogenic propensity.

variants.additional_notes: The V122I mutation is one of the most studied variants in TTR-related amyloidosis.
key_quotes: A recent study estimated that 3% of the African American population has the V122I mutation, which can cause TTR cardiac amyloidosis.

extraction_metadata.notes: Data was extracted thoroughly from the main text.
